select userId,visitorIP,visitorAddress ,visitorBrowser ,visitorOS, COUNT(*) AS count from visitor
and (visitorIP like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{visitorIP}), '%') or visitorAddress like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{visitorAddress}), '%') or visitorBrowser like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{visitorBrowser}), '%') or visitorOS like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{visitorOS}), '%'))
and DATE_FORMAT(visitTime,'%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
GROUP BY visitorIP,userId ORDER BY count desc
